backend/main.mo: Main Motoko actor implementing user profile management, daily totals storage with branch/user/date isolation, and access control integration using MixinAuthorization for permission checks.
feature_evidence.json: Empty feature evidence report JSON file with no features documented.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Text file containing JSON-formatted summaries of frontend source files including components for calculator, balance sheet, authentication, and print functionality.
frontend/index.css: Global CSS with Tailwind layers, OKLCH color system variables for light/dark modes, and print media queries to hide non-bill UI elements.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point with title "Varshini Classic Cuisine" and root div for React mounting.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main app component with branch authentication gate, view mode switching (calculator/dailyTotals/optimizeBill), print view routing, error boundary wrapping, and startup failure handling.
frontend/src/components/AppErrorBoundary: React error boundary component that catches render errors and external startup errors, displaying CrashFallbackScreen on failure.
frontend/src/components/auth/AuthGatePag: Authentication gate page requiring branch login with optional Internet Identity connection, shown before main app access.
frontend/src/components/auth/BranchLogin: Branch login form component with username/password inputs, validation, error handling, and submission state management using the useBranchAuth hook.
frontend/src/components/auth/BranchSessi: Displays current branch user and logout button when authenticated, using useBranchAuth hook to manage session state.
frontend/src/components/auth/LoginButton: Internet Identity login/logout button with loading states, error handling, and automatic retry logic for authentication failures.
frontend/src/components/CrashFallbackScr: Error fallback UI displaying error message with reload button for application crash recovery.
frontend/src/components/GuidanceNoticeBa: Notice bar component displaying draft link expiration warning with copy-to-clipboard button for current URL.
frontend/src/features/balanceSheet/Balan: Main view for displaying daily revenue totals and item quantities with day selection, clear all functionality, and success/error feedback alerts.
frontend/src/features/balanceSheet/hooks: Custom hook that manages daily total state, fetches balance sheet data from backend with localStorage fallback, and handles branch-scoped storage changes.
frontend/src/features/balanceSheet/ledge: Utility functions for managing branch-scoped daily ledger and summary data in localStorage, including loading, saving, clearing, and computing daily totals.
frontend/src/features/calculator/billCod: Generates unique bill codes in format BILL-YYYYMMDD-HHMMSS-XXXX with timestamp and random alphanumeric suffix.
frontend/src/features/calculator/catalog: Defines predefined catalog of menu items with prices, categories, and out-of-stock status for South Indian, North Indian, Rice, Curries, Snacks, Beverages, and Desserts.
Provides currency and number formatting utilities using Intl.NumberFormat for INR currency with 2 decimal places.
frontend/src/features/calculator/lineIte: Utilities for case-insensitive matching of catalog items to line items, finding duplicates, and calculating total added quantities.
frontend/src/features/calculator/Predefi: Catalog component for browsing, searching, and managing predefined items with categories, images, out-of-stock status, and quick-add functionality for bills.
TypeScript interface definition for PredefinedItemCatalog component props including catalog items, line items, and callback handlers.
frontend/src/features/calculator/PrintBi: React component that renders a print-only bill layout with header, line items table, totals breakdown (subtotal, tax, discount, final total), and footer for Varshini Classic Cuisine.
frontend/src/features/calculator/savedBi: Manages bill persistence to branch-scoped localStorage with functions to save, retrieve, list, and clear saved bill records including format snapshots.
frontend/src/features/calculator/TotalAm: Main calculator page component managing line items, tax, discount, and catalog integration with features to add/remove items, save bills, update ledger, print, and reset state.
frontend/src/features/calculator/types.t: TypeScript type definitions for LineItem, CalculatorState, and CalculationBreakdown interfaces used throughout the calculator feature.
frontend/src/features/calculator/utils.t: Core calculation utilities for parsing numbers, clamping values, computing line totals, subtotals, and full breakdowns with tax and discount.
frontend/src/features/calculator/utils/r: Utility function that reads an image file using FileReader and converts it to a base64 data URL string with validation.
frontend/src/features/optimizeBill/branc: Utility that enforces fixed print location addresses for specific branch users (bachupally, nezampat) that cannot be changed by users or overridden by backend/localStorage values.
frontend/src/features/optimizeBill/Optim: Page component for configuring default bill format settings including receipt style, payment QR code image upload, and print location address with branch-specific fixed address support.
frontend/src/features/optimizeBill/optim: Manages loading and saving bill format defaults (receipt style, payment scan URL, print location) to branch-scoped localStorage, enforcing fixed print locations for specific branches.
frontend/src/features/optimizeBill/recei: Defines receipt style types ('classic' and 'compact') with their metadata and sets 'classic' as the default style.
frontend/src/features/optimizeBill/useOp: React hook that loads bill format defaults from branch-scoped storage and provides a function to save them both locally and to the backend user profile, enforcing fixed print locations for specific branches.
frontend/src/features/optimizeBill/useSy: React hook that syncs bill print location from backend user profile to branch-scoped localStorage on authentication, skipping sync for fixed branch users to preserve their enforced addresses.
frontend/src/features/print/PrintViewPag: Page component that loads a saved bill from branch-scoped storage by ID and renders it for printing with auto-print functionality and manual print controls.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: React hook that creates and manages an authenticated or anonymous backend actor using Internet Identity, initializing access control and invalidating dependent queries on identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useBranchAuth.tsx: React context provider and hook for branch-based authentication with hardcoded credentials (bachupally/nezampat), persisting login state to localStorage and triggering data migration on login/hydration.
frontend/src/hooks/useCopyCurrentUrl.ts: React hook that provides a function to copy the current page URL to clipboard with fallback support for older browsers and status tracking (idle/success/error).
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: React context provider and hook for Internet Identity authentication, managing AuthClient creation, login flow, identity persistence, and providing authentication status and identity to child components.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for fetching and mutating user profiles, daily totals, and balance sheets using the actor from useActor hook.
frontend/src/hooks/useStartupFailureHand: Custom hook that listens for unhandled promise rejections and errors during app startup, capturing them as startup error state.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind CSS configuration with custom CSS variables for light/dark themes and print media styles for optimized printing of tables and content.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point that sets up React Query and Internet Identity providers, then renders the App component.
frontend/src/utils/branchScopedStorage.t: Provides branch-scoped localStorage utilities with namespaced keys per branch and handles one-time migration from legacy global storage keys.
frontend/src/utils/confirmDelete.ts: Utility functions for showing confirmation dialogs before deleting items or clearing all daily totals.
frontend/src/utils/iiProviderShim.ts: Shim that ensures a safe default Internet Identity provider URL is available, using Vite environment variables or falling back to production URL.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility functions for parsing URL parameters from both query strings and hash-based routing, with sessionStorage persistence support.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration defining custom color schemes using OKLCH color space, border radius variables, and including animation and typography plugins.
project_state.json: Project state metadata indicating a pending feature request (AR-1) to remove the bill-related section from the balance sheet view.
